statements: DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'credit';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM fraud_cases WHERE fraud_status = TRUE AND case_description LIKE '%fraud%'
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND customer_id = 500;
DELETE FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000);
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND amount > 1000
